testcase.classname: Login | user could be able to log in with valid email and password
testcase.name: user could log in with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to log in page..........................................passed And get current url.........................................................passed And user click on log in link...............................................passed When user fills email with valid data.......................................passed And user fills password with valid data....................................passed And user clicks on log in button............................................passed

testcase.classname: Registration | user should be able to sign up with new account
testcase.name: user could sign up with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: And user navigate to home page..............................................passed And user click on register link.............................................passed And user select gender type.................................................passed And user fills your personal details with valid data........................passed And user selects date of birth..............................................passed And user fills your password with valid data................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: Switch currencies | logged user could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.name: logged user could switch between currencies
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home.................................................passed And logged user choose Euro from dropdown menu..............................passed And loop in all products that has Euro sign.................................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the website.........................................passed And user search on "Apple" in search box text field.........................passed And user could find relative "Apple" results................................passed

testcase.classname: F05HoverCategories | user could hover on website categories and select a sub-category
testcase.name: user could hover website categories
testcase.system-out: Given user could navigates to the website homepage..........................passed When user hovers category and selects a sub-category........................passed

testcase.classname: F06HomeSliders | user could use home slider to navigate to a product

testcase.failure:
